nodes.text: The Fan Master was the Twi'lek responsible for maintaining the giant air entry ducts and fan housings in the city of Kala'uun on Ryloth. The Fan Master and his extended family cleaned ducts and maintained the fans to ensure that the ducts and air caves beneath the city were free of debris. During the Galactic Civil War, the position of Fan Master was held by Elam'shak.
